column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love love love this bakery and all the savory foods they have too! I always make it a point to come here a few times in the year
column2: and it (mostly) never disappoints. My friend got a sandwich and said the bread tasted stale but all my other experiences with the food were fine! Also
column3: their pastries are seriously amazing. The Kouign Amann(?spelling idk) is always so nice and crispy on the outside and soft on the inside and perfectly not too sweet either.
